title: Week 6 Recap, Aaron Rodgers Goes Down, Romo/Kaepernick Options In Green Bay? (Football (10/16)
description:
Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Will Brinson have you covered with a Week 6 recap, including an extensive conversation concerning the injury to one of the league's biggest stars, Aaron Rodgers (1:50), and potential replacement options at QB in Green Bay, with names like Tony Romo and Colin Kaepernick in the mix (3:30). The guys then give credit to the Vikings for a solid win over the Packers with a backup QB of their own (8:50), followed by discussion on the Steelers dealing the Chiefs their first loss of the season (14:03), the Raiders dropping 4 straight (18:30), what's wrong with the Falcons after blowing a 17-point halftime lead to the Dolphins (23:58), and early expectations for a New England-Atlanta Super Bowl rematch next week (28:11). Nick, Pete and Will then hit on the Saints surge (32:56), Adrian Peterson's impressive Arizona debut (37:52), whether to sell Redskins stock despite a win (40:44), and if the Ravens are dead (44:17).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
